title.value: Нутривант плюс и Спидфол Б - удобрения для некорневых подкормок посевов сахарной свеклы
Nutrivant plus and Speedfol B – fertilizers for leaf spray fertilization of sugar beet seedlings

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus in 2007 in the Laboratory of Fertilizer Systems and Plant Nutrition of the RUE
there were conducted studies in the SEC

of the Nesvizhsky district of Minsk region on the assessment of the effectiveness of complex mineral fertilizers with microelements in chelated form 'Nutrivant plus sugar beet' (36% P2O5 - K2O - + 24% + 2% Mg + B + 2% Mn -1% + fertivant ) . Foliar application to sugar beet (Beta vulgaris var. saccharifera) crops was carried out in a dose of 6 kg / ha twice: first fertilizing - in this phase of 4-6 pairs of leaves (3 kg / ha), the second - in 35-40 days after the first one(3 kg / ha). It should be noted that 'Nutrivant plus sugar beet' in its composition contains fertivant which is capable of holding on the surface of a leaf apparatus the nutritive elements for 3-4 weeks, until they get to the entire plant. There was also assumed a theory of biofungicidal action of the presented water-soluble fertilizers complex in suppressing plant pathogens.
